abstract: The notifications offer examples of the issues involved in Europe’s decision to allow individuals some control over what appears online about themselves.
snippet: The notifications offer examples of the issues involved in Europe’s decision to allow individuals some control over what appears online about themselves.
lead_paragraph: Google has notified The New York Times in the last month that links to five articles have been removed from some search results on European versions of its search engine to comply with Europe’s “right to be forgotten.”

headline.main: Times Articles Removed From Google Results in Europe
headline.print_headline: Times Articles Removed From Google Results in Europe

byline.original: By Noam Cohen and Mark Scott
